I'm a fan of Justin Jackson. He was certainly a very exciting slam dunker who was worth his weight in gold to Mavericks. Don't get me wrong- I still enjoy watching him play even though he's past his prime. He proved his worth to the team by helping win multiple championships. His worth to the team was incalculable. I must say he's made significant progress with his three point shooting in the past six weeks. Unfortunately his leg injury has progressed fairly rapidly in the last two weeks forcing him to be sidelined for four weeks because of his injury. He complained that taking a four week hiatus was too long bit it's for his own good. He has a follow-up to the doctor next friday. His friend LeBron James will also be out of commission until his back heals. He hasn't made much progress with his shooting since he injured his back. His doctor said he was making good progress and will check on his progress next month. He assigned the blame for his injury to a lack of training and stretching. Oh well it could be worse. His worth of contribution to Lakers is incalculable. Lakers is as likely to best Cavaliers as warriors in my opinion. Recently Lakers didn't just beat Bulls. They wiped the floor with bulls. Everybody was on the edge of their seats. LeBron yelled at bulls "in your face!" when.lakers won. Bulls has lost its edge to some extent since its point leaders left the team. Just the other week Suns edged out Bulls by three points which reminded me of warriors edging out Cavaliers by one point. The role of every coach in every team is well defined. Everybody has a vital role to play in every team. In addition the government has appointed a commission to investigate the use of steroids among players. Another commission has also been set up to examine family violence in NBA which I wholeheartedly support. My friend Alex has got a front row tickets for the All-Star game in February which was very difficult to buy. I said "fair enough. It was hard to buy a front row ticket but you should've asked your boss if you could get a few days off beforehand as you'll need to fly to America for it" He was too excited lol. Yesterday I hadmy personal training in the gym and my vest was soaking wet so I soaked in a jacuzzi afterwards. The gym is situated beside the jacuzzi where you can see the inside of the gym clearly. I saw a slender guy lift a light two pound dumbbell for all he was worth but still couldn't complete the exercise. I enjoy hitting the gym and I know my personal trainer is worth her salt as.im making good progress with my physique. She's a vivacious in-your-face woman who's sometimes too honest for her own good. I dislike working out in Physical Fitness because the salespeople there are way too in-your-face.
